title: Chevy Vehicle Name Emblems
content:
Looking for if there is even a font out that Chevy uses for their emblems on their cars for the name of the vehicle, like the “Silverado” below:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024959im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/07_silverado_rearbadge_4074.jpg)

 [‹ Looking for a serif face similar to the Chloe type signature](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024959/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35388 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) United States Marines square shadowed face - ITC Pioneer No. 2 {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409024959/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35818 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vinyldesignz

comments.content: Car manufacturers more often than not have custom alphabets designed for lettering the vehicle name emblems. I’m not ruling anything out, just saying.
Hmm I was afraid of that. Know of anything close?
